text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product title below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product title:
Coffee in the Morning, Beer At Night (Periodic Beer Glass + Caffeine Molecule Mug)

Product features:
Periodic Beer Glass and Caffeine Molecule Mug Set
Perfect for Every Day: Coffee in the Morning, Beer at Night
Nerd Out with Awesome Drinkware!
Periodic Beer Glass (16 oz) and Caffeine Molecule Mug (8 oz)
text.Response A: This National Tree 30 Inch Crestwood Spruce Wreath with Cones, Glitter, Red Berries, Silver Bristle and 50 Battery Operated Warm White LED Lights is the perfect addition to your holiday decor. The elegant and classic design of this wreath is trimmed with red berries, pine cones, and glitter, giving it a warm and inviting look. The pre-strung 50 UL listed warm white LED lights add a touch of elegance and brightness to the wreath. The battery-operated design allows for easy and convenient placement, as it requires no power outlet. The 6 hours on/18 hours off timer ensures that the wreath will automatically turn off after 6 hours, and turn back on again 18 hours later. This wreath is fire-resistant and non-allergenic, making it safe to use both indoors and covered outdoors.
text.Response B:
Experience the ultimate in nerdy drinkware with the Coffee in the Morning, Beer at Night (Periodic Beer Glass + Caffeine Molecule Mug) set. This Periodic Beer Glass (16 oz) and Caffeine Molecule Mug (8 oz) set is the perfect way to show off your love for all things nerdy while enjoying your favorite beverages.

The periodic table of elements is a tool used by scientists to represent the known chemical elements and their properties. The coffee mug features a detailed representation of the periodic table of elements, with each element represented by its symbol and atomic number. The periodic beer glass, on the other hand, features a more simplified representation of the periodic table, with the elements arranged in a circle around the outside of the glass.
